original_title: Sri Lanka’s shares edge up in mid day trade
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka‘s shares edged up in mid day trade on Wednesday, Colombo Stock Exchange data showed.
The main All Share Price Index was up 0.61 percent or 52.85 points to 8,764.31, while the most liquid index S&P SL20 was up 0.64 percent to 16.20 points to 2,530.57
Top gainers were Hatton National Bank, Richard Pieris and Vallibel. (Colombo/May3/2023)
